scripts.backend:dev: cd backend/api && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.backend: cd backend/api && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.lint:backend:api: cd backend/api && poetry run ruff check . && poetry run black --check .
scripts.lint:backend:embeddings: cd backend/embeddings && poetry run ruff check . && poetry run black --check .
scripts.lint:backend:eval: cd backend/eval && poetry run ruff check . && poetry run black --check .
scripts.lint:backend: npm run lint:backend:api && npm run lint:backend:embeddings && npm run lint:backend:eval
scripts.format:backend: npm run format:backend:api && npm run format:backend:embeddings && npm run format:backend:eval
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.benchmark: cd backend/eval && poetry run python -m eval_cli.main pipeline run-all rag24 --experiment-id benchmark_all_modes
scripts.benchmark:lexical: cd backend/eval && poetry run python -m eval_cli.main pipeline run rag24 --mode lexical --experiment-id benchmark_lexical
scripts.benchmark:hybrid: cd backend/eval && poetry run python -m eval_cli.main pipeline run rag24 --mode hybrid --experiment-id benchmark_hybrid
scripts.benchmark:vector: cd backend/eval && poetry run python -m eval_cli.main pipeline run rag24 --mode vector --experiment-id benchmark_vector
